title: Pretty Penny
creator_credit: Australian Film Commission, Shane Luther and Jacinta Stone
brief_description: A light-hearted cautionary tale about human ambitions and moral dilemmas that centres on the relationship between an avaricious coin collector and and a woman who owns a rare coin. Cast: Kestie Morrassi, Shane Luther. (Awards: Sydney Film Festival, 1999; Watch My Shorts Film Festival Melbourne, 1999; Sydney Video & Film Festival, 1999)
